text: Episynlestes cristatus is a species of Australian damselfly in the family Synlestidae, commonly known as a tropical whitetip. It is endemic to north- eastern Queensland, where it inhabits streams in rainforest. Episynlestes cristatus is a large, very slender damselfly, coloured a dull bronze-black with white markings. It often perches with its wings outspread. ==Gallery== Episynlestes cristatus female wings (34788219596).jpg | Female wings Episynlestes cristatus male wings (34788223066).jpg | Male wings ==See also== * List of Odonata species of Australia == References == Category:Synlestidae Category:Odonata of Australia Category:Insects of Australia Category:Endemic fauna of Australia Category:Taxa named by J.A.L. (Tony) Watson Category:Taxa named by Maxwell Sydney Moulds Category:Insects described in 1977 Category:Damselflies
title: Episynlestes cristatus
